meta_title: Fast Root Cause Diagnosis: Slash MTTR with Triage Techniques
meta_description: Stop guessing and start fixing. Learn how to apply fast root cause diagnosis techniques like the IS/IS NOT method, 5 Whys, and AI-driven triage to reduce MTTR.
title: Fast Root Cause Diagnosis: How to Stop "Part-Swapping" and Slash MTTR

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Fast Root Cause Diagnosis: How to Stop "Part-Swapping" and Slash MTTR

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, clean manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance technicians (wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests) are gathered around a large industrial motor. One technician is holding a rugged tablet (back facing camera) pointing it at the machinery, implying the use of augmented reality or digital diagnostics. Another technician is pointing at a specific component of the motor, engaged in discussion. The background is slightly blurred but shows high-tech automated conveyor systems and soft blue industrial lighting. The atmosphere is focused, professional, and collaborative. No text or overlays.
